entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫29,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫19,99 [‚Ç∫19,99 ~ ‚Ç∫29,99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Wafari Watch Browser, allowing you to effortlessly browse the web on your Apple Watch. Supports multiple search engines with customizable search options. Quick bookmark creation and synchronization. Browsing history. iCloud data synchronization. Welcome to use!

entry.title: LUCH: Photo Effects & Presets
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫29,99]Ôºâ

Application Description

LUCH Films is a modern app for giving images the effect of film photography. Try unique bokeh effects, light leaks, noise and dust effects, and original filters. 20+ HANDMADE FILTERS The application has over 20 different filters made by hand by a professional photographer. They are universal and made for various kinds of photos and colors, imitating the effects film KODAK and ILFORD. FILM FRAMES FOR INSTAGRAM STORY AND FEED We have adapted film frames for modern screen formats and added them to the application so that the warmth of film photography will always remain in our hearts and minds. DUST EFFECT Making a shabby photo is easy. You don't have to wait 20 years, you just have to choose one of 35 effects. LIGHT LEAKS You know these old light leaks shots that we loved to look at as children. We simulated the same light flashes in the LUCH FILMS. BOKEH EFFECT If you love bokeh as much as we do, then you should definitely love it. Choose from 35 bokeh and prism effects. NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS, NO IN-APP PURCHASES Take full control over your image, apply unique filters developed in collaboration with photographers. Create unique photos including new layers. Over 90 effects. The ability to apply noise and dust effects, light leaks, bokeh and prism effects to the image. You can choose the size of the image for a stream or story, which is ideal for Instagram or other social networks. Film frames are also included in the LUCH Films. Follow @luchfilmsapp on Instagram for inspiration from our community of users. We love hearing your ideas and feedback. Please email hello@vostokapp.ru or DM us on Instagram at @luchfilmsapp for questions or suggestions.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: 13:20:Sync
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫179,99]Ôºâ

Application Description

This app puts the Mayan Dreamspell Calendar in your pocket! "13:20:Sync makes it so much easier to understand and integrate the calendar into every day life. Highly recommend it." The Mayan People have described, in breathtaking precision, the cycles of both the universe and nature around us. They created a harmonic calendar that is synchronized to all those cycles. Following these cycles can help you get a stronger connection with nature around you and become conscious of your essence. This app provides a simple way to sync along those cycles, to raise our frequency and give us a new lens to view both our day-to-day and planetary events. - Did you ever realize that our (Gregorian) calendar is not a harmonic calendar? - Did you know that the moon has 13 (not 12!) orbits around the earth in 1 year? - Why do we live with this irregular calendar? - Are you interested in Astrology? -> All this, and more, is explained carefully in this app. (over 15.000 words on 37 pages) Please note that these text are in English language only. In the New Time, synchronicity is the norm. ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 5 star rating across the world! ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// "Entertaining as well as enlightening" ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// MORE INFO: www.1320sync.com For the beginner this app is a learning tool because it contains an extensive explanation about Tones and Seals and the synchronizing order of the Mayan Astrology. You may think it's difficult at first but soon you will feel how it all connects. "This app is great, and allows easy manipulation of dates. I spent years in books doing in hours what I can now do in seconds." For the ones who are already familiar with the Mayan Calendar this app is a handy tool to navigate the cycles, and calculate the Combined Kin for any given combination. Furthermore this app can be of great assistance to teach other people about the 13:20 cycles and is used in teachings around the world. === FEATURES === + Kin Calendar This is your main Mayan Dreamspell Calendar Dashboard with all the details you need to stay in sync. Shows the Kin of today by default, and you can calculate the Kin for any other date. + Personal Notes On this new page you can keep your personal notes for the 2 main cycles of time: the Tzolkin cycle of 260 days and the 13 Moon cycle of 365 days. And with the powerful text search function you quickly find your notes. + Kin Picker Select any combination of the 13 Tones and 20 Seals. Top section can scroll to 4 pages with information. + Combined Kin Calculator Calculate the Combined Kin of any combination of Kin. You can add as many Kin as you like to calculate the Combined Kin for a group of people. + Tzolkin with indication of the GAP day's and Wavespell and more. Tap and hold to select a Kin number directly. + Contact Import All contacts in your Contacts App will be automatically imported and assigned to the correct Kin. See all your contacts with their Mayan Reading and how you relate to them. + 13 Moon Calendar Full integration of 13 Moon Calendar. (doubles as a birthday calendar!) + 13:20 Information Lots of information about the theory behind synchronization to help you navigate the Mayan Dreamspell Calendar. The texts provide a clear explanation of the Cycles of Time. (More than 15.000 words on 37 pages) Please note that these text are in English language only. + Sharing On all the 3 main tabs you can share the current selected Galactic Signature using your favorite app. # Based on the work of Jos√© Arg√ºelles. # This app was made with permission of and in cooperation with the Foundation for the Law of Time - www.lawoftime.org, # Ariel Spilsbury.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: PlayNav - No ads in videos!
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫39,99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Are you tired of interruptions caused by ads in your YouTube videos? The new YouTube PlayNav video browser will block all intrusive ads that appear while watching your videos, so you can enjoy your favorite videos smoothly and without interruptions. Plus, our app offers features you‚Äôll love: ‚Ä¢ On-Screen Playback: Watch YouTube videos while using other apps. ‚Ä¢ Audio-Only Mode: Listen to any YouTube video with your screen locked. ‚Ä¢ Auto Shutdown: Set a sleep timer. (Premium) ‚Ä¢ Loop Mode: Automatically repeat your favorite videos. (Premium) ‚Ä¢ Learning Mode: Learn languages using subtitles. (Premium) It also includes essential features such as playlists, speed adjustment (improved), related videos, AirPlay, and more to enhance your video-watching experience. ¬ª HOW TO USE PLAYNAV? ON-SCREEN PLAYBACK (PIP) (Premium) Watch YouTube videos while using any other app. Once activated, the player will shrink on your screen, allowing you to move or hide it with a double tap. ¬ª How to activate it? 1. While playing a video, tap the PIP icon in the upper-left corner (two small screen icons). 2. While a video is playing, swipe up from the bottom of your iPhone, and the player will appear on your screen. AUDIO-ONLY MODE Listen to the audio of your favorite YouTube videos with your iPhone screen locked. Use it while exercising, walking, or before bed. Combine it with the auto shutdown feature to relax while listening to your favorite videos! ¬ª How to activate it? 1. Enable On-Screen Playback. 2. Then, lock your iPhone, and the audio will continue playing. AUTO SHUTDOWN Bedtime? Find your favorite YouTube video or playlist, set the auto shutdown timer, and let your favorite audio accompany you as you fall asleep. ¬ª How to activate it? 1. Tap the Sleep icon (moon) in the player. 2. Select the time you want for auto shutdown. 3. You can combine it with Audio-Only Mode. LOOP MODE (REPEAT VIDEO) Want your video to play on repeat? Use Loop Mode to replay your video as many times as you like. You can also combine it with Audio-Only Mode. ¬ª How to activate it? 1. Tap the Repeat icon. Your video will keep playing on loop until you disable it. LEARN LANGUAGES WITH SUBTITLES (LEARNING MODE) Now you can learn languages using subtitles! When you activate Learning Mode, you will see both the original subtitles and the translation in your language. You can also adjust the playback speed to better understand each word. ¬ª How to activate it? 1 Search for videos in the language you are learning. 2 Once your video starts playing, tap the Learning Mode button next to the video title. ‚Äì TRY PLAYNAV NOW! ‚Äì Enjoy all basic features for free and unlock Premium with a one-time purchase. Minimum requirements: ‚Ä¢ iOS 15 or higher. ‚Ä¢ 3G connection or higher. ¬ª Related keywords: YouTube, YouTube Music, YouTube Vanced, ad blocker, no subscription, skip YouTube ads, ad-free music, block pop-ups, adblock for YouTube, block pop-up ads, ad-free content, premium ad blocker, AdBlock Plus, remove ads, YouTube without ads. - Need help? Visit: playnav.vidiom.app or contact us at info@playnav.vidiom.app Terms of Service: playnav.vidiom.app/terms-of-service Privacy Policy: playnav.vidiom.app/privacy-policy

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Dumb Phone: Minimal Launcher
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Dumb Phone is a minimalist apps launcher designed to help you reduce screen time by keeping your home screen clean and free of notifications. Fully customizable, Dumb Phone lets you select the apps that are most important to you and display them in a simple, minimalistic interface on your home screen. Whether you prefer dark or light mode, this launcher works well with both, allowing you to choose the view that suits you best. Stay focused and simplify your digital life with Dumb Phone.

entry.title: Day R Premium
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Handful of capsÔºö‚Ç∫99,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫99,99]

Application Description

Survive in post-nuclear USSR: defeat diseases, hunger and enemies! Play Online also! Survive with other players together. Benefits of Premium version: - Unique pet Raven - Starter Kit - Caches of useful items in shelters - Expanded selection of perks - Chat without any limitations - Reduced waiting time between parcels - Access to all kinds and colors of map markers Can you survive in the world destroyed after a nuclear war? With radiation, hunger and diseases around you. You have to cross the whole country and save your family. Who knows if they are alive, or maybe radiation and deadly virus have already reached them? Reveal a secret of the apocalypse and get your memories back during a journey across the huge territory of the USSR in the 80th. It is not easy to survive after apocalypse. You'll face the real hungry games! Monsters, zombie, thirst, uncountable diseases and injuries, blood-thirsty enemies ‚Äì you have to fight it all. Craft all your resources: weapons, clothes, means of transport. - Hardcore survival: Hunger, zombie and radiation won't give you a chance to relax. - Realistic world: The turn of the seasons, huge map of USSR and more than 2500 different towns and cities. Hunt animals, but be careful: even rats can injure you seriously! Explore the wilderness! - A lot of opportunities: Multicraft, obtaining skills, hundreds of crafting schemes, a lot of ammunition. - People and stories: Interesting quests and helpful allies. An open game world. - Improve your skills: Mechanics, medicine, chemistry and many others. - Cooperative mode: The Online mode with a chat room, exchange of items and united fightings. Multiplayer survival game. Explore the abandoned houses and shelters. Find weapon and build transport using various materials. Remember everything you learnt on chemistry and physics! It is the most realistic surviving game! Features: - –°raft system ‚Äì get resources, hunt, find useful objects or weapon and create your own one! - Hardcore simulator of survival - Journey across the wilderness map in the multiplayer mode - Choose the difficulty mode: sandbox, real life or online War never changes. In 1985 USSR went down before an unknown enemy. In a few days the entire country became a radioactive wasteland - violence, hunger and diseases reign here now. When you no longer loose in the fight with the death, the other survivors wait for you in the cooperative - the Online mode let you survive together dealing with difficulties, talking in the chat room and sending gifts to each other. User agreement: http://tltgames.ru/license-agreement-en

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Everybody's RPG: Reboot
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫39,99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Recruit legendary heroes and conquer endless stages! From auto battles to mining and upgrading! A true idle fantasy RPG that keeps growing even when you're away! * Build strategic teams with unique and powerful heroes! * Mine resources through the mining system! Get everything you need to craft gear! * Challenge powerful bosses and claim legendary rewards! * Progress automatically ‚Äî perfect for busy players! * Tons of content: dungeons, relics, evolution, legendary equipment, and more! Download now and begin writing your own legend! Start playing now and collect your heroes!

entry.title: Wall of insanity
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫19,99 ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series. It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world. You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless. Story: A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins... Key Features: - Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world. - A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go? - A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition. And your life. - Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed. Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds. - Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Classic Maze game is a classic puzzle game, perfect for training your brain during a short break. It is designed as a very simple single player game played by sliding through fun retro mazes. Play a quick game and challenge 500 mazes to become the maze king.

entry.title: The Game of Life 2
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • The Ultimate Life CollectionÔºö‚Ç∫1.299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫899,99 [‚Ç∫899,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.299,99]

Application Description

Live 1000 lives in the official sequel to the classic family board game, The Game of Life! Will you be a Video Blogger or an Astronomer? Play now! Voted "Best Digital Board Game‚Äù in the Pocket Gamer Awards 2021 Played by over 50 Million Families Worldwide Customise your peg, hop in your eco car and race your friends and family through The Game of Life 2! It‚Äôs a contemporary sequel to the classic family favourite board game, The Game of Life. With an added crossroad moment and new ways to win, what will you choose? Earn points for Knowledge and Happiness as well as Wealth. Go to College, or don‚Äôt. Get married early, save it for later, or stay single! Have kids, adopt pets, do both or neither. The choices are all yours, and every decision counts! Features The Game of Life 2 digital board game is the award-winning sequel to the original Hasbro board game, The Game of Life. ‚Ä¢ A GAME FOR UP 4 PLAYERS - Join 3 of your favourite people and live your dreams ‚Ä¢ *NEW* VIDEO CHAT AND PLAY - Live every life face-to-face with in-game video chat ‚Ä¢ AN AD-FREE GAME - Enjoy the complete game with no interruptions ‚Ä¢ 6 TRANSLATIONS - English, French, Spanish, German, Italian and Brazilian Portuguese ‚Ä¢ SINGLE PLAYER - Take on our challenging AI ‚Ä¢ ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Connect with fans, or invite friends and family to a private game ‚Ä¢ PASS & PLAY - No internet? No problem! Pass a single device between players for a wifi-free experience How to play CUSTOMISE your character Customise your pink, blue or newly available purple peg with a style all of your own. SPIN THE SPINNER The game starts with a big decision. Will you go to College or straight into work? In this classic simulation, what will your friends and family choose? It‚Äôs your LIFE PATH Get married or don‚Äôt, have kids, adopt pets, or both! Work as a Pet Groomer, then qualify and become a Wind Turbine Technician! The choices are yours! More WAYS TO WIN Earn points for every choice you make! Every choice increases your wealth, happiness or knowledge, so every decision is valid. RETIRE your way Continue living the life of your dreams! Relax in a luxury home, or hit the road and fulfil your bucket list! Unlike the classic board game, you can choose to venture on! Earn REWARDS to UNLOCK new items Unlock new pegs, outfits and vehicles by playing the game and earning rewards! In-game Video Chat Recreate the magic! Gather around the board with in-game video chat in Online Multiplayer Mode. It‚Äôs super easy to set-up and play: ‚Ä¢ Create your free private account ‚Ä¢ Invite your friends and family to chat groups ‚Ä¢ Start games straight from those chats ‚Ä¢ Play face-to-face wherever you are It‚Äôs simple, seamless fun for everyone. The Ultimate Life Collection Venture into a collection of 10 amazing fantasy worlds. Live life in enchanted worlds, make friends with dinosaurs in the Age of Giants and launch into the futuristic Lunar Age! Every new world features new Outfits, Vehicles, Jobs, Properties and more!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad
